title: So Riot when will we be getting a ultimate skin team?
body: We have 3 ultimate skins, jungle support and adc are covered, all we need is a top and a mid to complete the ultimate team :) the hard thing is which champ has awesome particle effects for those skins. Are Riot going to finish these set of skins?

replies.body: We get one ultimate skin about every year or so, and DJ Sona came out around Worlds last year. So we can be expecting one in a few months, unless Riot wants to really surprise us.
if only khazix was a viable enough for one. legit give him an insane form every evolution point, rack in mad money since who wouldn't buy that shit?
For me Riven would be lovely! She has mad animations :) see Riot should consider these champs :D
You know what I bet they'll do something silly like ultimate urgot or ultimate galio.
I'd love a Veigar ultimate skin, but his final boss skin is better than anything that could be made.
I like superb villain veigar but that's just me. I think veigar has an ultimate Christmas skin though...
I agree! I don't use Veigar but if I had that skin I would spam him lol
Ultimate skin ekko?... also they got pulsefire ezreal
